title: Synthesis of metallic Ag and semiconducting ZnS nanoparticles in self -assembled polyelectrolyte templates

author: Manca Logar, Advanced Materials, Jožef Stefan Institute

segmentation: Good afternoon ladies and gentlemen.
In this talk I will present the Institute synthesis method for the inorganic nanoparticles in the fabrication of composite.
Symptoms.

Nanometer sized inorganic particles exhibit size dependent properties, which are different from their bulk materials properties, mainly due to large surface to volume ratio and quantum confinement effect.

To process these nanoparticles into the form for possible technological applications where control over the size and content concentration of the nanoparticles is obtained, the synthesis was performed.
In the polyelectrolyte multilayer template.

With this synthesis, nanoparticles formed in situ in the polymer matrix where the surrounding polymer chains limits their aggregation, while the volume fraction and size are controlled by varying the.
This is conditions.
The template for the Institute nanoparticle synthesis is formed with a layer by layer self assembly method.
With the sequential dipping overcharged substrate into fully anion and publicat ion solution.

Where the driving force for the multilayer build up other electrostatic interactions between oppositely charged groups of the polyelectrolyte chains, as Poly and iron Poly acrylic acid were used and as publicat ion polyamine polyelectrolyte work.
How is used?
The properties of the multi layered template depend on the type of the polyelectrolyte and the pH value of the.
Polyelectrolyte solutions since Poly acrylic acid.
Polyelectrolyte is a weak Poly onion.
It has a situation degree which is pH dependent.
This means that the charge density on the Poly alliance chains controls the confirmation state of.
Bull electrolyte chains in.
Also the final thickness of the multilayer film.

As the pH is increased from 2.5 to 3.5, the Poly acrylic acid chains become more ionized and therefore due to high repulsion repulsion of the charge groups there could confirmational state becomes flatter.
As a result the thickness of this layer is smaller.
And on the other hand, more.
Polyketide chains is needed to neutralize the charge on the surface.
Which means that the increase in public Italian.
This layer is observed as pH is increased from 2.5 to 3.5 and although the.
Boolean iron layer thickness decreases with increasing pH value.
The increase in incremental techniques of publicat ion layer is more pronounced and therefore the thickness pribyl belier is increased as the pH value of the assembly is increased.
Further, more at certain pH value, the thickness of the multilayer template is controllable.
In nanometer scale with the number of the pole electric.
Might be layers at sorbed.
Ask Back pamphlet is then used for the Institute synthesis of inorganic nanoparticles.
When this template is prepared at low pH values, it contains non ionized carboxylic groups.
Which when this is exposed to the metal side solution precursor solution at higher pH value.
This carboxylic acid groups are dissociated and binded with metal ions.
Which are after reduction or sophistication, transformed into inorganic nanoparticles.
This reaction also regenerated the carboxylic acid group in the multilayer film, which enables further metal ion binding.
For the silver nanoparticle synthesis multilayer film was prepared with three different pH values.
It was then exposed to the silver at the touch solution.
At higher pH value.
And the iron containing multilayer reduced in sodium borohydride solution to form in silver nanoparticles.
But as formed, nanoparticles are uniformly distributed within the multilayer film in and crystalline.
The volume fraction and size of the silver nanoparticles in the multi layer film is controlled by the pH value.
Of the polyelectrolyte assembly.
At lower pH value, there are more free carboxylic acid group in the film, so more silver ions can bind in the multi layer film and therefore higher volume fraction of silver is obtained.
As the pH value is increased.
The difference in Confirmational state of the polyelectrolyte chains in this induces the changes in the structure of the polymer film and also affect the size of the nanoparticles.
As the pH is increased, larger average particle diameter is obtained and consequently lower concentration of the nanoparticles in the films observed at higher pH values.
In the other visible absorption spectrum, surface plasmon resonance of the silver nanoparticles dominated the visible wavelength.

With maximum sentence around 44140 nanometers, the existence of single absorption peak in the visible region confirms our observers observation from the transmission electron microscopy images that the nanoparticles are essentially spherical.
And as with, decreasing the pH value of the multi layer assembly.
Higher volume fraction of silver in the multilayer film is obtained.
And Moreover, interparticle distance are decreased.
This induces higher interparticle interactions, which reflects in the redshift of the surface plasmon resonance peak position.
The volume fraction of silver and silver particles can also be increased by repeating the synthesis process after three reaction cycles, the volume fraction of silver is 65%.
And larger particles are obtained since then.
At Sorbed irons are in the closer proximity of the previously formed nanoparticles.

This causes the growth and therefore lowering the interparticle spacing, which also this changes in the volume fraction and interparticle spacing again causes the increase in interparticle interaction and therefore the redshift of the surface plasmon resonance peak position.
For the Institute, think sulfide nanoparticle synthesis multilayer film was.
First exposed to the sodium chloride solution in order to increase the efficiency of think iron binding in the multi layer film.
The incorporated ions were sophisticated with sodium sulfite in order to form nanoparticles.
The average particle diameter is increased with the increasing the pH value of the multilayer.
Information as well as by.
Increasing the number of the reaction cycles.
Although we expected that.
Think of sulfide nanoparticles.
Crystal structure would be worth it.
Some reflections from the selected area diffraction pattern also corresponds to the valid structure, which is probably.
The consequence of the small size of things.
Like nanoparticles and as I said that with increasing the pH value and the number of the reaction cycles, the average particle diameter is increased due to quantum confinement effect.
This is reserved as a redshift of the absorption peak position.
In conclusion we have prepared the multilayer template for the Institute nanoparticle synthesis, where the thicknessing controllable is controllable in nanometer scale.
Which was then used.

To synthesize silver and zinc sulfide nanoparticles where the volume fraction and size increase is controlled by the pH value of the polyelectrolyte multilayer assembly and number of the reaction cycles.
By increasing the pH value and.

Number of the cycles, larger size and lower volume fraction of inorganic nanoparticles in composite films were obtained and all these changes in the particle properties allow the control over the optical properties of the composite films.
Thank you for your attention.
